description: This file defines a team of agents for stock research, including event handling and streaming responses, utilizing OpenAI models and financial tools.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with a name, model, role, and tools.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with a specific mode and configuration.

classes.name: RunEvent
classes.description: Event class for agent run events.

classes.name: TeamRunEvent
classes.description: Event class for team run events.

methods.name: run_team_with_events
methods.description: Asynchronous function to run the team with streaming event handling.
